text: Mark Andrew Brilakis (born November 27, 1958) was a lieutenant general in the United States Marine Corps, who served as the Commander of United States Marine Corps Forces Command. He was commissioned through Platoon Leaders Class upon graduating from Franklin & Marshall College in 1981. He retired on July 12, 2019. https://www.marforcom.marines.mil/Leaders/article-view- display/Article/634186/lieutenant-general-mark-a-brilakis/ ==References== Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:People from Dayton, Ohio Category:Lieutenant generals Category:Franklin & Marshall College alumni Category:United States Marine Corps officers
title: Mark A. Brilakis
